ctx: induction tr as [| [n' [i | l]] tr' IHtr].
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: induction tr as [| [n' [i | l]] tr' IHtr].
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros tr n h H. unfold trace_mutual_exclusion' in *. induction tr as [| [n' [i | l]] tr' IHtr]. - apply H. - destruct h as [m|]. + destruct i; simpl in H; destruct (fin_eq_dec _) as [Heq | Hneq]. * destruct n; [inversion Heq|]. apply IHtr. auto. * apply IHtr. auto. + apply IHtr. auto.
